title: Building high-resolution projections of temperature potential changes using statistical downscaling for the future period 2026–2100 in the highland region of Yemen – A supportive approach for empowering environmental planning and decision-making
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Environmental and Sustainability Indicators, Volume 24

Author(s): Ali H. AL-Falahi, Naeem Saddique, Uwe Spank, Christian Bernhofer
